name: transposh-fse-block
description: Bloc Gutenberg dynamique pour widget PHP natif de Transposh (FSE compatible)
author: Frédéric Galliné

scripts.build: wp-scripts build --blocks-manifest && cp render.php build/render.php && cp flag-libraries-config.php build/flag-libraries-config.php
scripts.start: wp-scripts start --blocks-manifest && cp render.php build/render.php && cp flag-libraries-config.php build/flag-libraries-config.php
